sentences.en: An executioner is a person who carries out the death sentence.
sentences.cn: 刽子手是执行死刑的人.

sentences.en: Aspect of Banshee changed to provide Warshout and Exarch Executioner.
sentences.cn: 女妖之道升级的效果改为提供战吼和行刑者.

sentences.en: But all of this was end when she found the executioner.
sentences.cn: 这一切都继续著,直到她发现了住在森林中的刽子手.

sentences.en: Frequently both victims and the executioner were drunk.
sentences.cn: 待处决的犯人和刽子手双方都经常喝得醉醺醺.

sentences.en: He looked like an executioner had cleaved his head.
sentences.cn: 他看上去就像是被刽子手砍了头.

sentences.en: I'll executioner myself,'said the King eagerly, and he hurried off.
sentences.cn: “我亲自去找刽子手.”国王殷勤地说着, 急急忙忙走了.

sentences.en: Moore ascended the scaffold and addressed the executioner.
sentences.cn: 穆尔走上断头台，和刽子手说话。

sentences.en: No man in Tabriz trifled with the executioner.
sentences.cn: 在大不里士没人敢轻视行刑者。

sentences.en: She could not walk to the block, so the executioner helped her.
sentences.cn: 她不能走到木台那儿, 于是那刽子手拉她过去.

sentences.en: The denunciator of success is the only legitimate executioner of the fall.
sentences.cn: 只有控诉过胜利的人才有权裁判失败.

sentences.en: The elephant executioner crushes it beneath his enormous foot.
sentences.cn: 由充当刽子手的大象用巨大的脚掌踩碎.

sentences.en: The executioner cut off his head at one blow.
sentences.cn: 刽子手一刀就把他的头砍了.

sentences.en: The executioner put down his axe and stood quietly.
sentences.cn: 刽子手放下了斧子,一言不发地站着.

sentences.en: The executioner quickly dispatched the condemned man.
sentences.cn: 行刑者迅速地将该犯处决了.

sentences.en: They told the executioner to let him go , and pardoned him.
sentences.cn: 就让刽子手停止行刑, 赦免了王延寿.

words.tran_cn: 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的
执行，执行程序；主任参谋，副舰长
经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员
执行者；[法] 遗嘱执行人

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to execute criminals
